```{r}
# install.packages("tidyverse")
library('tidyr')
library('ggplot2')
```


```{r}
file <- '../data/correlation_exact_match/corrMatrix_cloudforest_aklimate.tsv'
```

```{r}
# Note some rounding seen (pval, corr)
df <- read.csv(file, header=TRUE, sep='\t') %>% as.data.frame()

ggplot(df, aes(x=corr)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth=0.01, color='black') +
  ggtitle(paste(df$group1[1], 'vs', df$group2[1])) +
  labs(x='Correlation', y='Count')
 geom_vline(aes(xintercept=0.1), color="blue", linetype="dashed", size=1)

```
